verbs.description: ibm [V: is] being sued for age discrimination three former ibm employees are suing the technology company for age discrimination the tech company has fired more than an estimated 20 000 employees aged 40 or older in the last six years according to a report here what to do if you 're discriminated against in the workplace based on your age attorney vp of human resources ibm business insider discrimination age propublica dan ryan bloomberg principal ryan search heather bussing
